mapper.select:
select m.*, reply.reply from (select m.*,post.post from (select m.*,blog.blog from (select m.*,point.point from
(select * from member where power=0) m
(select * from member where email=#{email} and power=0) m
left join (select NVL(sum(charge),0)-NVL(sum(use),0) as point, email from point group by email)point on m.email=point.email)m left join (select NVL(count(url),0) as blog, email from blog group by email)blog on m.email=blog.email)m left join (select NVL(count(num),0) as post, email from post group by email)post on m.email=post.email)m left join (select NVL(count(num),0) as reply, email from reply group by email)reply on m.email=reply.email

select r.*,p.url,p.title from reply r left join
(select num,url,title from post) p
(select num,url,title from post where email=#{email}) p
on r.pnum=p.num
select * from deposit where accept="N" order by ddate desc
select * from withdraw where accept="N" order by wdate desc
